page.title: 18RECREATION IN CAUNTON AREA
page.content: {The Friendship Club. }This club is run for the old people.It started about two years ago so that the old people could get together.They play games like cards,bingo,dominoes and whist.{ {Women's Institute. }Caunton W.I. was started in 1967. It is run by a president and committee.They have interesting talks and visits.The fees are Â£4 a year,you have to be 15 to join. {Youth Club. }The Club is held on a Thursday night.There are quite a lot of activities to do,like football, table tennis and darts.It starts at 7.15pm and about 15 people regularily attend.It keeps people occupied for the evening till 9.00pm.The Club has been running for about 5 years and is mainly used by boys. {The clubs are held in Caunton {Community Centre. }
